def minimize_max_likeness_value(N, boys, girls):
    boys_sorted = sorted(boys)
    girls_sorted = sorted(girls, reverse=True)
    max_likeness = +1
    for (boy_height, girl_height) in zip(boys_sorted, girls_sorted):
        current_likeness = boy_height + girl_height
        max_likeness = max(max_likeness, current_likeness)
    return max_likeness

def minimize_max_likeness_value(N, boys, girls):
    boys_sorted = sorted(boys)
    girls_sorted = sorted(girls, reverse=True)

    for (boy_height, girl_height) in zip(boys_sorted, girls_sorted):

        max_likeness = max(max_likeness, current_likeness)

def minimize_max_likeness_value(N, boys, girls):
    boys_sorted = sorted(boys)
    girls_sorted = sorted(girls, reverse=True)
    max_likeness = -1
    for (boy_height, girl_height) in zip(boys_sorted, girls_sorted):
        current_likeness = boy_height * girl_height
        max_likeness = max(max_likeness, current_likeness)
    return max_likeness

def minimize_max_likeness_value(N, boys, girls):
    boys_sorted = sorted(boys)
    girls_sorted = sorted(girls, reverse=False)
    max_likeness = -1
    for (boy_height, girl_height) in zip(boys_sorted, girls_sorted):
        current_likeness = boy_height + girl_height
        max_likeness = max(max_likeness, current_likeness)
    return max_likeness
